sentences.sContent: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.sCn: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.sContent: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
...So that's not a good atmosphere for a child...
...The carbon that we've put into the atmosphere keeps having a warming effect for 100 years...
...And as land is cleared for those new cities — especially in the dense tropical forests — carbon will be released into the atmosphere as well...
...3.5-5 billion metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere each year - making forests the leading source of greenhouse gases...
...University” We cannot let the CO2 in the atmosphere rise indefinitely...

synos.tran: [心理]气氛；[气象][地物]大气；空气

phrases.pCn: n. 学业风气，学习氛围
炉气氛，炉内气氛；炉内蒙气
易爆气体环境；爆燃性空气
还原空气；还原性气氛；还原性蒙气
中性气氛；中性大气；中性蒙气

remMethod.val: atmo ＋ sphere(球体) → 围绕地球的空气 → 大气

trans.tranOther: the feeling that an event or place gives you
